list.title: LazAI: Building a Human-Aligned AI Infrastructure
list.desc: In a world where AI has the potential to shape every facet of life, LazAI envisions a future where every individual can share in the value AI creates

list.title: iDAO: The Missing Piece That Makes AI Human-Aligned
list.desc: If you want AI to serve people, then people should govern the data that AI learns from. iDAO makes that possible

list.title: Alith: The Framework Powering the Future of Autonomous AI
list.desc: In the last two years, dozens of AI agent frameworks have emerged. But few deliver true autonomy. Why?

list.title: DAT — Turning AI Data into Programmable Economic Assets
list.desc: In DeFi, we tokenize money. In LazAI, we tokenize intelligence. DAT(Data Anchoring Token), as a new token standard, identifies and prices data, transforming it into traceable, verifiable, and composable AI assets.

list.title: Verified Computing Framework: Building Trust in Decentralized AI
list.desc: This framework underpins LazAI’s commitment to transparent and secure AI execution. It ensures that every inference, training update, or agent behavior is validated, anchored on-chain, and challenged if misused.

list.title: Introducing the Corrupted Alith Mini App: Meme-Engineered Chaos, Now Interactive
list.desc: The world’s most misaligned AI is now live in its own Telegram-powered Mini App. A hilariously broken, satirically sharp AI agent born out of everything that could go wrong in AI development

list.title: Defining New Primitives in an AI-Native Economy
list.desc: Explore how LazAI is defining new AI primitives, establishing a self-reinforcing incentive structure, and driving sustainable network effects for human-aligned data and AI models.
